Using a baby formula 
preparation machine
If you use a machine to make up 
bottles of formula, make sure 
the water that comes out of the 
machine is at least 70 degrees 
Centigrade when combined 
with the formula. Water at this 
temperature will kill any harmful 
bacteria that may be in the 
formula.
You can check the temperature 
using a simple digital food
